Anna's Pizzeria

  • About
  • Our Menu

  • Location
  • We Deliver!

Sun Prairie's favorite pizza for over 25 years.

Delicious hand-made pizza, always made fresh, to your order.

Pizza sizes are: 12", 14", 16", 18". (inches in diameter)
Pizzas start with traditional thin crust, our home-made sauce, and mozzarella cheese. Because everything is made fresh just for you, We can make the crust thinner or thicker.

Toppings: extra-cheese, sausage, pepperoni, Canadian-bacon, bacon, mushroom, onion, green-pepper, green-olive, black-olive, tomato, pineapple, banana-pepper, jalapeno-pepper, ground-beef, shrimp and anchovy.

Seasonings: oregano, garlic, crushed-red pepper, salt and black-pepper.

Specialty Pizzas

Anna's Works

Sun Prairie's favorite pizza! Toppings include: cheese, sausage, pepperoni, mushroom, onion, green-pepper, and BACON!

Meat Lovers

A classic meat lovers pizza. Toppings include: cheese, sausage, Canadian-bacon, pepperoni, and bacon.


Veggie Lovers

There is no meat on this pizza. Toppings include: cheese, mushroom, onion, green-pepper, black-olives, and green-olives

The Hawaiian

One bite of the Hawaiian pizza and you could almost imagine yourself in an island paradise... or maybe not, but it does taste great! Toppings are: cheese, Canadian-bacon, and pineapple.

Side Orders

Bread

  • Cheese-Bread
  • Garlic-Bread
  • Garlic-Cheese-Bread

4 slices of Italian style bread per order.

Drinks

We have 2-liter bottles of Pepsi products. Inside at the bar we also serve beer; Bud-light or Miller Genuine Draft and soda.

  • Pepsi and Diet-Pepsi
  • Mountain Dew
  • Siera Mist
  • Root-Beer

How to order

If you are new to the restaurant, the best way to get started is to look at our menu. To place an order, simply call or stop in, we are located on West Main Street. For payments we currently are accepting cash or local checks only, sorry no credit cards accepted at this time.

We are easy to find!

Located at 1609 West Main st. in Sun Prairie just a few blocks east of highway 151, Only five minutes from Madison. Many of our regular customers come from neighboring communities such as Deforest, Windsor, Marshall, Columbus, or Cottage Grove to pick up their favorite pizzas. Of coarse if you live in or near Sun Prairie, there is no need to come in and pick up your order, because we offer a great delivery service also.

Get it delivered!

Take a look at our menu and give us a call: 608.825.2660, and we will help you choose the right size pizza or pizzas and deliver it to you as soon as possible anywhere in Sun Prairie and the surrounding area. We consistently deliver to Token Creek and will take deliveries on a case by case basis to Windsor, East Bristol, and the eastern portion of East Madison. If you live outside of town and you are interested in a delivery, we sometimes make exceptions depending on the distance and how busy we may be at the time.
